titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of December 19, 2020, as "National Wreaths Across America Day".
Expressing support for the designation of December 19, 2020, as "National Wreaths Across America Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
